sources.style\\style.sass:
* 
	padding: 0px
	margin: 0px

@import 'header'
@import 'about'
@import 'footer'

.content
	display: fex
	position: relative
	margin: 0px
	padding: 0px

.content__background
	width: 100%
	
.content__text
	display: flex
	flex-flow: row wrap
	justify-content: flex-end
	width: 297px
	height: 48px
	position: absolute
	top: 85%
	right: 5%
	font-family: Montserrat
	font-size: 14px
	line-height: 24px
	text-align: right
	color: rgba(31, 32, 65, 0.75)
sources.style\\header.sass:
nav.header-menu a, div.header-buttons a
	text-decoration: none 
	color: rgba(31, 32, 65, 0.5)

a:active
	color: rgba(31, 32, 65, 0.75)
	
.header_style
	background-color: #FFFFFF
	width: 100%
	height: 70px
	box-shadow: 0px 10px 20px rgba(31, 32, 65, 0.05)
	display: flex
	flex-direction: row
	align-items: center
	justify-content: space-between



.header-logo
	margin: 15px 0px 15px 90px



.header-menu 
	min-width: 450px
	width: 527px
	display: flex
	justify-content: space-between
	margin: 26px 0 26px 300px
	font-family: 'Montserrat', sans-serif
	font-size: 14px
	line-height: 17px
	color: rgba(31, 32, 65, 0.5)

.header-menu__item_home
	font-weight: bold

.header-menu__item_services-icon
	padding-left: 3px



.header-buttons
	min-width: 180px
	width: 200px
	margin: auto auto auto 25px
	font-family: 'Montserrat', sans-serif
	font-style: normal
	font-weight: bold
	font-size: 12px
	line-height: 15px
	display: flex
	justify-content: space-between

.header-buttons__login
	padding: 9px 20px 10px 20px
	border: 2px solid #BC9CFF
	border-radius: 22px
	color: #BC9CFF
	
.header-buttons__register
	padding: 9px 20px 10px 20px
	border: 2px solid #BC9CFF
	border-radius: 22px
	color: #FFFFFF
	background: linear-gradient(180deg, #BC9CFF 0%, #8BA4F9 100%)
sources.style\\about.sass:
//Общий блок
.about_style
	background: #FFFFFF
	box-shadow: 0px 1px 0px rgba(31, 32, 65, 0.1)
	display: flex
	align-items: center
	justify-content: space-around
	height: 372px


//Логотип с текстом
.logo_style
	width: 260px
	height: 156px
	display: flex
	align-content: center
	justify-content: flex-start
	flex-direction: column
	font-family: Montserrat
	font-style: normal
	font-weight: normal
	font-size: 14px
	line-height: 24px
	color: rgba(31, 32, 65, 0.75)

.about-logo__text
	line-height: 24px



//Меню со ссылками
.about-menu
	width: 800px
	display: flex
	align-content: flex-start
	justify-content: space-between
	height: 170px

.about-links
	display: flex
	flex-flow: column nowrap
	justify-content: flex-start
	align-items: flex-start
	
div.about-menu a,span,h3,p
	font-family: 'Montserrat', sans-serif
	font-size: 14px
	line-height: 40px
	color: rgba(31, 32, 65, 0.5)
	text-decoration: none

.about-links__header
	font-size: 12px
	font-weight: bold
	text-transform: uppercase
	color: #1F2041



//Блок отправки EMAIL
.form__subscrime_style
	display: flex
	flex-direction: column
	align-content: flex-start
	justify-content: flex-start
	width: 250px
	height: 84pх

h3.sub-content__header
	font-size: 12px
	text-transform: uppercase
	color: #1F2041

p.sub-content__text
	line-height: 200%
	padding-bottom: 16px
	
.subscribe__input
	border: 1px solid rgba(31, 32, 65, 0.25) 
	border-radius: 4px
	display: flex
	flex-flow: row nowrap
	justify-content: space-between
	padding: 10px
   
input.sub__input-email
	border: none 
	outline: none 
	-webkit-appearance: none 
	width: 274px 
	vertical-align: center 
	font-size: 14px
	color: rgba(31, 32, 65, 0.25)
   
input.sub__input-submit
	width: 20px 
	height: 20px 
	border: none 
	background: url(/img/forward.png) no-repeat 95% 95%
	align: center
sources.style\\footer.sass:
.footer_style
    display: flex
    align-items: center
    justify-content: space-between
    padding: 26px 140px 
    background: #FFFFFF
    box-shadow: 0px 10px 20px rgba(31, 32, 65, 0.05)
    //Шрифт для текста внутри блока.
    font-family: Montserrat
    font-size: 14px
    line-height: 17px
    color: rgba(31, 32, 65, 0.75)
    margin-top: 2px

.nav-socials_style 
    width: 112px
    height: 24px
    display: flex
    align-items: center
    justify-content: space-between
